description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

relatedNodes.html: <aside class="fixed inset-y-0 left-0 z-40 w-64 transform bg-slate-950 text-white shadow-xl transition-transform duration-300 md:translate-x-0 -translate-x-full">

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.49 (foreground color: #727784, background color: #020618, font size: 8.3pt (11px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
